name: Kingdome of Nartan
description:
Introduction

This is a small project I started a while ago. I abandoned it because at the time it was to complex for me as a solo-dev. I started working on other games and forgot it existed but I wanted to finally upload a game so here its is, my first somewhat playable game:

Build your City

You play as a Lord who is instructed by his king to build a new town somewhere in a mysterious valley. But you are not alone so defend your realm and build a city that will last for a thousand years.

Feedback Please

At least that was what I had planned but it turned out as a half-baked city-builder with rarely any depth. But please try it out and give me valuable feedback it really helps to encourage me to make more and better games .

Disclaimer

This game will not be finished and there are a lot of bugs. Please note that I am only 13 Years old and currently working on other projects but once again feedback is always welcome. Even on an abandoned game.
